channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Whale Dynamic partners with Noodoe to create self-driving delivery ecosystem

item.title: Lots of young people are clueless about money — older folks aren’t much better
item.description: For older investors, every money-related decision can affect the size and safety of their nest egg.

item.title: ‘I prepaid our mom’s rent for a year’: My sister is a millionaire and never helps our mother. How do I cut her out of her will?
item.description: “I have worked for more than six months to get my elderly mother a place to live.”

item.title: Weakest ADP jobs report in two years points to hiring freeze tied to trade wars. Is the worst over?

item.title: ‘He failed in his fiduciary duty’: My brother liquidated our mother’s 401(k) for her nursing home. He claimed the rest.
item.description: “My brother, the executor of her will, coerced her during her illness to give him power of attorney.”

item.title: Nvidia says its Blackwell chips lead benchmarks in training AI LLMs
item.description: Nvidia announced today its Blackwell chips are leading the AI benchmarks when it comes to training AI large-language models.

item.title: Your AI models are failing in production—Here’s how to fix model selection
item.description: The Allen Institute of AI updated its reward model evaluation RewardBench to better reflect real-life scenarios for enterprises.
